channel.title: VimR with NeoVim
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates for VimR.

item.title: SNAPSHOT-20201205.204436
item.description:
WARNING This version may be very instable!

Since SNAPSHOT-20201121.103800

  • language-command works again.

Since 0.34.0

  • Universal binary!
  • Neovim 0.5-dev (neovim/neovim@0798ad3a3a071db1b647df5aecd7698ed9aff7d9)
  • GH-804: Configurable cursor shapes and color: Thank you @cypheon!
  • GH-812: Allow all fonts, but warn when variable width font is selected.
  • Do not hard-code ${LANG} environment variable to en_US.UTF-8.
  • Replace FontAwesome with Material Icons.
  • Dependencies updates:
    • httpswift/swifter@1.5.0
